contextId.occurrenceNote: Here "departure" is a polite way of referring to death. Alternate translation: "Soon I will die and leave this world" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-euphemism]])
contextId.quote: ὁ καιρὸς τῆς ἀναλύσεώς μου ἐφέστηκεν
contextId.glQuote: The time of my departure has come
